para1: Traditionally, in Spain, women wear knee length dresses with a fascinator or hat for early afternoon weddings and floor length dresses for evening weddings. Since our wedding will start in the late afternoon, feel free to wear whatever length dress (or trousers, jumpsuit etc.) you prefer. The brighter the better!
para2: You may wish to bring a pashmina or cardigan in case the temperature drops after dark.
para4: The Groom and the Best Man will wear morning suits. The rest of the gents are welcome to wear morning suits or regular suits.
